text: Ronald Peter Perranoski (April 1, 1936 â€“ October 2, 2020) was an American Major League Baseball left-handed relief pitcher, who played from 1961 through 1973. He was born in Paterson, New Jersey. He played for the Los Angeles Dodgers, Minnesota Twins, Detroit Tigers, and the California Angels. Perranoski died on October 2, 2020 in Vero Beach, Florida at the age of 84.Former Dodgers lefty Perranoski dies at 84 ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Los Angeles Dodgers players Category:Minnesota Twins players Category:Detroit Tigers players Category:California Angels players Category:Sportspeople from New Jersey Category:People from Paterson, New Jersey
title: Ron Perranoski
